SEARCH
Package elpasominersbank

Interface Interaction

All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagerInteraction, PersonInteraction
public interface Interaction
The Interaction interface provides methods for selecting accounts, performing transactions, and interacting with a banking system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    interact(Scanner in)
    Initiates the interaction process with the user.
    void
    performTransaction(int choice, Customer customer, Account account, Scanner in, BankDatabase db, LogFile log)
    Performs a transaction based on the choice of the user.
    Account
    selectAccount(Scanner in, Customer customer)
    Selects an account for a customer using their input.

  • Method Details

    • selectAccount

      Account selectAccount(Scanner in, Customer customer)
      Selects an account for a customer using their input.
      Parameters:
      in - the Scanner object for user input
      customer - the user making the selection
      Returns:
      the selected Account

    • performTransaction

      void performTransaction(int choice, Customer customer, Account account, Scanner in, BankDatabase db, LogFile log)
      Performs a transaction based on the choice of the user.
      Parameters:
      choice - transaction to perform
      customer - the user performing the transaction
      account - the Account on which the transaction is to be performed
      in - the Scanner object for user input
      db - the BankDatabase instance for accessing account information
      log - the LogFile instance for logging transactions

    • interact

      void interact(Scanner in)
      Initiates the interaction process with the user.
      Parameters:
      in - the Scanner object for user input
